reviewText: This certainly is a very funny show! When it comes to comedy & drama you can't beat the English, as they're master's at it.

Although there are only a couple episodes, I enjoyed it very much. I didn't expect the ending for Gary and Dorothy, but found it delightful. I have a large collection of Martin Clunes videos - he is wonderful!
Finally they made Gary resolve this feelings and the relationship with Dorothy.  Its about time!
